ThingShape.description: This Thing Shape provides the properties, services, and subscriptions to create utilization records in the implemented data objects; When a thing using the shape has a change PTCSCReason property value, a new record will be inserted in the utilization data object, with the required contextual data. If the required property values are not available in the thing instance (PTCSCUtilizationState and PTCSCReasonCode), a custom service on the thing will need to be created to code these in and / or look these up. It is expected that the determination of the PTCSCUtilizationState and/or PTCSCReason change may depend on several machine tags. It is recommended to have this custom service that is executed on critical tag property data change to determine if the PTCSCUtilization and/or PTCSCReason should be changed. When the PTCSCReason is changed, a record will get inserted in the implemented Utilization data object.
ThingShape.documentationContent: This Thing Shape provides the properties, services, and subscriptions to create utilization records in the implemented data objects; When a thing using the shape has a change PTCSCReason property value, a new record will be inserted in the utilization data object, with the required contextual data. If the required property values are not available in the thing instance (PTCSCUtilizationState and PTCSCReasonCode), a custom service on the thing will need to be created to code these in and / or look these up. It is expected that the determination of the PTCSCUtilizationState and/or PTCSCReason change may depend on several machine tags. It is recommended to have this custom service that is executed on critical tag property data change to determine if the PTCSCUtilization and/or PTCSCReason should be changed. When the PTCSCReason is changed, a record will get inserted in the implemented Utilization data object.
ThingShape.name: PTCSC.Utilization.ModelLogic_TS

Row.code: var result = me.name + " " + me.description;
if (me.PTCSCSimulationEnabled === true){ me.UpdatePTCSCSimulatedProperties();}
